Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Contredanses, KV 269b

c. 1777 · KV1,2,3 – · KV6 269b

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 5'

  • 1. G major
  • 2. G major
  • 3. C major
  • 12. D major

These are piano versions of orchestral dances, although no orchestral version is known. In the only existing copy, the dances are numbered nos. 1–3 and 12, with the rest lost.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/13/1/1 · BA 4517-01 · Tänze / Band 1 · ed. Rudolf Elvers
  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/2 · BA 4584-02 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Einzelstücke · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Associated Board · Mature Piano Pieces · ed. Richard Jones
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5745 · Einzelstücke für Klavier · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Könemann · K 113 · Klavierstücke · ed. István Máriássy
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50229 · Klavierstücke / Band 1: Frühere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger

1. G major

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. G major

An orchestral version of this is used as the second of the four contredanses (KV 101/250a).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

3. C major

This piece is incomplete.

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

12. D major

An orchestral version of this is used as the third of the four contredanses (KV 101/250a).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2
